comment._content:
Went to GCA RADAR maintenance school in one of those old hangers,  69-70

NAS Miramar Ground Electronics, 70-74, maintained FPN-52  and FPN-36 QUAD RADAR  and TACAN

comment.author: 71912550@N08
comment._content: The blimp hangar on the right housed the Air Traffic Control school in 1962
